reviewText:
I just wanted to say thank you so much for deciding to sell this on Amazon! I was at the premiere in Deep River, and loved
the movie! Made for great conversation with all of my friends from Deep River. It's so weird seeing it on the big screen!

Once again, thank you! This is awesome, I can't wait for it to get here!

I love this movie the zombies are great and the nude scenes are HOT!!!!!

Definitely highly recommend this movie!!!!!!

Came up with a great drinking game to go with it.....will post a video of it soon!!!!
